summary.span: Microsoft Word 对象事件的事件接口 。

span.span: Events interface for Microsoft Word object events.

summary.span: 构建基块插入文档时发生。

span.span: Occurs when you insert a building block into a document.

para.span: 有关将事件与对象一起使用的信息 ，请参阅使用 Document 对象的事件

span.span: For information about using events with the object, see Using Events with the Document Object

summary.span: 该事件在关闭文档时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a document is closed.

para.span: 如果该事件过程储存在模板中，则在关闭基于此模板的新文档或作为文档打开的该模板本身时将运行该事件过程。

span.span: If the event procedure is stored in a template, the procedure will run when a new document based on that template is closed and when the template itself is closed (after being opened as a document).

summary.span: 在将内容控件添加到文档之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after adding a content control to a document.

para.span: 有关将事件与对象一起使用的信息 ，请参阅使用 Document 对象的事件

span.span: For information about using events with the object, see Using Events with the Document Object

summary.span: 在更新内容控件中的内容之前发生，仅适用于内容来自 Office XML 数据存储区的情况。

span.span: Occurs before updating the content in a content control, only when the content comes from the Office XML data store.

para.span: 有关将事件与对象一起使用的信息 ，请参阅使用 Document 对象的事件

span.span: For information about using events with the object, see Using Events with the Document Object

summary.span: 在从文档中删除内容控件之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before removing a content control from a document.

para.span: 有关将事件与对象一起使用的信息 ，请参阅使用 Document 对象的事件

span.span: For information about using events with the object, see Using Events with the Document Object

summary.span: 将文档的 XML 数据存储更新为内容控件的值之前出现。

span.span: Occurs before updating the document's XML data store with the value of a content control.

para.span: 有关将事件与对象一起使用的信息 ，请参阅使用 Document 对象的事件

span.span: For information about using events with the object, see Using Events with the Document Object

summary.span: 当用户进入内容控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a user enters a content control.

para.span: 重要说明：此事件仅对您输入的内容控件（而不是针对父内容控件）触发。

span.span: Important: This event fires only for the content control that you enter and not for parent content controls.

para.span: 例如，如果您的一个文本框内容控件嵌入内容组控件，您要将光标置于该文本框内容控件，则此事件仅对该文本框内容控件触发一次，而不对内容父组控件触发。

span.span: For example, if you have a text box content control nested inside a group content control, and you place the cursor inside the text box content control, this event fires only once for the text box content control; it does not fire for the parent group content control.

para.span: 有关将事件与对象一起使用的信息 ，请参阅使用 Document 对象的事件

span.span: For information about using events with the object, see Using Events with the Document Object

summary.span: 当用户离开内容控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a user leaves a content control.

para.span: 重要说明：仅当您退出而不是父内容控件的内容控件时，才会触发此事件。

span.span: Important: This event fires only for the content control that you exit and not for parent content controls.

para.span: 例如，如果您将一个文本框内容控件嵌套到组内容控件内，并且将光标从前者移动到文档中的另一个位置，则此事件仅为该文本框内容控件触发一次，而不为父级组内容控件触发。

span.span: For example, if you have a text box content control nested inside a group content control, and you move the cursor from inside the text box content control and into another place in the document, this event fires only once for the text box content control; it does not fire for the parent group content control.

para.span: 有关将事件与对象一起使用的信息 ，请参阅使用 Document 对象的事件

span.span: For information about using events with the object, see Using Events with the Document Object

summary.span: 在创建基于模板的新文档时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a new document based on the template is created.

para.span: 只有当它存储在模板中，将运行 新建 事件的过程。

span.span: A procedure for the New event will run only if it is stored in a template.
Occurs when a document is opened.

para.span: 如果事件过程存储在一个模板中，则在打开基于该模板的新文档或将该模板本身作为文档打开时，将运行该过程。

span.span: If the event procedure is stored in a template, the procedure will run when a new document based on that template is opened and when the template itself is opened as a document.

summary.span: 在属于“文档工作区”的文档的本地副本与服务器上的副本同步时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the local copy of a document that is part of a Document Workspace is synchronized with the copy on the server.

summary.span: 用户向文档中添加新 XML 元素时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a user adds a new XML element to a document.

para.span: 如果同时向文档中添加多个元素（例如，剪切和粘贴 XML 时），则插入的每个元素都会激发该事件。

span.span: If more than one element is added to the document at the same time (for example, when cutting and pasting XML), the event fires for each element that is inserted.

summary.span: 用户从文档中删除 XML 元素时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a user deletes an XML element from a document.

para.span: 如果同时从文档中删除了多个元素（例如，剪切和粘贴 XML 时），则删除的每个元素都会激发该事件。

span.span: If more than one element is deleted from the document at the same time (for example, when cutting and pasting XML), the event fires for each element that is deleted.
